title: Google Pixel 3a XL UNBRICK
content: Hi friends! I need your help, my phone can’t boot after the update, I can’t get into the recovery, but I can get into the fastboot, my bootloader is blocked ... I live in Russia, and unfortunately I do not have an official Google service in my country to go there for help. I read a lot of different forums on this issue, experienced developers say that I need to download the firmware in raw format (it contains files such as prog_emmc_firehose.mbn, patch0.xml, rawprogram0.xml) and restore the phone with QPST. Where can I download prog_emmc_firehose.mbn, patch0.xml and rawprogram0.xml, or does Google carefully hide them? Why, after all, android is an open system for everyone?
